Class OrderList

Object
OrderList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ListPrinter
public class OrderList extends Object implements ListPrinter, Serializable
Class to manage and interface with order objects
Author:
Chan Hui De Elliot
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static int
    orderID
    static attribute orderID initialises as 1 every new order is assigned an orderID based on this static attribute used to maintain a unique orderID for every order
    private ArrayList<Order>
    orderList
    ArrayList to store all orders

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderList()
    used to construct a new orderList object constructs an ArrayList of orders within

    Method
    Description
    int
    addOrder​(int staffID, Instant date, orderType ordertype, int tableID)
    creates a new order object and adds it to the order ArrayList used static attribute orderID as orderID for objects and increments it afterwards so that each orderID is unique
    boolean
    deleteOrder​(int orderID)
    to delete an order in arraylist based on orderID mostly used for debugging purposes only
    void
    generateInvoice​(int orderID, boolean member)
    creates new invoice object from order object order object is searched for with getOrderByOrderID function then calls printer function for said invoice object to generate the invoice for this order

    Uses orderID to search for a specific order

    implemented function from ListPrinter interface prints all orderIDs in orderlist that have yet to be completed condition is based on orderCompleted flag in order

    boolean
    updateOrder​(int orderID, Menu menulist)
    function to add or delete items in the order choose add or delete then choose set or alacarte item for adding item, specific item object has to be searched for in menu object via itemID for deletion of item, itemID is searched for in arrayLists and deleted if it matches specified ID

  • Field Details

    • orderList

      private ArrayList<Order> orderList
      ArrayList to store all orders

    • orderID

      private static int orderID
      static attribute orderID initialises as 1 every new order is assigned an orderID based on this static attribute used to maintain a unique orderID for every order

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderList

      public OrderList()
      used to construct a new orderList object constructs an ArrayList of orders within

  • Method Details

    • getOrderList

      public ArrayList<Order> getOrderList()
      gets the arraylist of orders within orderlist object
      Returns:
      orderList arraylist

    • setOrderList

      public void setOrderList​(ArrayList<Order> orderList)
      overriddes the current order arraylist should not be used unless for debugging purposes
      Parameters:
      orderList - to override current arraylist

    • deleteOrder

      public boolean deleteOrder​(int orderID)
      to delete an order in arraylist based on orderID mostly used for debugging purposes only
      Parameters:
      orderID - of order to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if succesful, false if failed

    • updateOrder

      public boolean updateOrder​(int orderID, Menu menulist)
      function to add or delete items in the order choose add or delete then choose set or alacarte item for adding item, specific item object has to be searched for in menu object via itemID for deletion of item, itemID is searched for in arrayLists and deleted if it matches specified ID
      Parameters:
      orderID - of order to be updated
      menulist - menu object for food object to be retrieved from
      Returns:
      true if succesful, false if failed

    • addOrder

      public int addOrder​(int staffID, Instant date, orderType ordertype, int tableID)
      creates a new order object and adds it to the order ArrayList used static attribute orderID as orderID for objects and increments it afterwards so that each orderID is unique
      Parameters:
      staffID - of staff that served this order
      date - date and time the order is created
      ordertype - enum orderType(dine-in or takeout)
      tableID - tableID of table where order is seated
      Returns:
      orderID of order created

    • updateArchive

      public boolean updateArchive​(RevenueReport revport, int orderID)
      adds order into revenue report object order to be added based on orderID
      Parameters:
      revport - revenue report object where order is added to
      orderID - of order to be added
      Returns:
      true if succesful, false if failed

    • printList

      public void printList()
      implemented function from ListPrinter interface prints all orderIDs in orderlist that have yet to be completed condition is based on orderCompleted flag in order
      Specified by:
      printList in interface ListPrinter

    • generateInvoice

      public void generateInvoice​(int orderID, boolean member)
      creates new invoice object from order object order object is searched for with getOrderByOrderID function then calls printer function for said invoice object to generate the invoice for this order
      Parameters:
      orderID - of order to be added
      member - to decide whether to apply member discount or not

    • getOrderByOrderID

      public Order getOrderByOrderID​(int orderID)
      Uses orderID to search for a specific order
      Parameters:
      orderID - to be found
      Returns:
      order if found, else returns null

    • getOrderByTableID

      public Order getOrderByTableID​(int tableID)
      Uses tableID to search for an active order with matching tableID
      Parameters:
      tableID - to search
      Returns:
      order if found, else return null

    • getTableIDByOrderID

      public int getTableIDByOrderID​(int orderID)
      returns the table occupied by an order
      Parameters:
      orderID - to be used for searching
      Returns:
      the tableID if found, else returns -1
